text: Blethisa multipunctata is a species of ground beetle native to Europe.Fauna EuropaeaCarl H. Lindroth 1974 Coleoptera. Carabidae. Handbooks for the Identification of British Insects Vol 4 Part 2. Royal Entomological Society,London pdf The habitat is stream, river and lake margins. It is amphibious, able to hunt below water for up to an hour. ==References== multipunctata Category:Beetles described in 1758 Category:Taxa named by Carl Linnaeus Category:Beetles of Europe
title: Blethisa multipunctata
